channel.title: Allstar to Delta code

item.title: Allstar to Delta code
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

There is no fit items on Allstar , which fits to Delta. Delta has lots of different methods, etc.
You cannot use codes from Allstar to Delta, if you don’t know real methods of them.

I’m grand user of AllstarScape Source… Don’t try replace Delta’s stuff with Allstar ones.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

You can’t just copy it into anywhere, you need to place it in the right method.

item.title: Allstar to Delta code
item.dc:creator: @_Articuno `Articuno
item.description:
@_Articuno wrote:

How can I make this code which is from an Allstar Source, work on a Delta source? I’m still learning, so constructive comments please. I tried C&P, no errors, but it didn’t work.

[code] appendPos();

    smitimer -= 1;
    if (smitimer <= 1) {
        savechar();
        println_debug("Auto saved game.");
        savemoreinfo();
        println_debug("Auto saving moreinfo file...");
        if (savemoreinfo()) {
            println_debug("Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file.");
            attempts = 0;
            smitimer = 20;
        } else if (!savemoreinfo() && attempts <= 5) {
            println_debug(
                    "Error saving moreinfo file! Retrying in 5 seconds");
            println_debug("Attempts: " + attempts);
            attempts += 1;
            smitimer = 5;
        } else if (!savemoreinfo() && attempts >= 5) {
            println_debug(
                    "Attempts: " + attempts
                    + " - Giving up saving moreinfo file!");
            attempts += 1;
            smitimer = 99999999;
        }
    }[/code]

public void appendPos() { try { sendQuest("X: " + absX + " Y: " + absY, 184); sendQuest("Your coordinates", 183); } catch (Exception e) { println_debug("Error"); } }

Read full topic
